sense.def:
Če neki predmet postane
entangled in something
, se v nekaj ujame in ga tisto, na primer vrv ali mreža, drži.

seg.quote: The oar got entangled in the weeds.

sense.def:
To be entangled in a difficult situation
pomeni imeti težave, da uidemo težavnemu položaju.

seg.quote: The country became entangled in a grave economic crisis.

sense.def:
To be entangled with someone
pomeni biti vpleten v odnos z nekom, ki nam povzroča težave.

seg.quote: She got entangled with a crook.
